courses.title: Guitar Fundamentals
courses.description: Learn the basics of playing guitar with our comprehensive beginners course.

courses.title: Piano Basics
courses.description: Discover the fundamentals of playing the piano, from reading sheet music to proper hand positioning.

courses.title: Music Theory Fundamentals
courses.description: Gain a solid understanding of music theory, including scales, chords, and harmony.

courses.title: Singing Techniques Workshop
courses.description: Learn essential singing techniques, including breath control, pitch, and vocal exercises.

courses.title: Music Production 101
courses.description: Explore the basics of music production, including recording, editing, and mixing.

courses.title: Drumming Essentials
courses.description: Master the basics of drumming, including rudiments, beats, and rhythms.

courses.title: Bass Guitar Basics
courses.description: Learn the fundamentals of playing bass guitar, including technique and groove.

courses.title: Jazz Improvisation Masterclass
courses.description: Dive into the art of jazz improvisation with advanced techniques and concepts.

courses.title: Songwriting Workshop
courses.description: Unlock your creativity and learn the craft of songwriting, from lyrics to melody.

courses.title: Classical Music Appreciation
courses.description: Explore the history and masterpieces of classical music, from Baroque to Romantic.

courses.title: Electronic Music Production
courses.description: Learn to produce electronic music using synthesizers, samplers, and digital audio workstations.

courses.title: Gospel Choir Training
courses.description: Join a dynamic gospel choir and learn vocal techniques, harmonies, and performance skills.
